# FPL Analysis Website - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
This is a Next.js 14+ application for Fantasy Premier League (FPL) data analysis and team optimization.

## Tech Stack
- **Framework**: Next.js 14+ with App Router
- **Language**: TypeScript
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS
- **Charts**: Recharts
- **API**: FPL API Wrapper (Python backend integration)

## Project Structure
- `/app` - Next.js app router pages and layouts
- `/app/api` - API routes for fetching FPL data
- `/components` - Reusable React components
- `/lib` - Utility functions and helpers
- `/types` - TypeScript type definitions

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for all files
- Follow Next.js 14+ App Router conventions
- Use Tailwind CSS for styling
- Keep components small and focused
- API routes should handle data fetching and transformation

## Features
- Real-time FPL data analysis
- Player comparison and statistics
- Team optimization algorithms
- Fixture difficulty analysis
- Interactive dashboards and charts
